title: Lil’ Ouchie Boo Boo
description: If you trip and scrape your knee, or you fall on your elbow. If you stub the toes upon your feet. Lil’ Ouchie Boo Boo is there for you!
quote: And sometiemss you will find boo boos can happen on the inside.
altHero: Lil’ Ouchie Boo Boo, a bandaid with arms and legs and a big smile
alt1: an apple bangs its toe on a block and says, “Ouchie!”
alt2: Lil’ Ouchie Boo Boo has a band-aid for the apple
alt3: a nail chases Lil’ Ouchie Boo Boo
alt4: Lil’ Ouchie Boo Boo pointing at a silhouette with a heart on a display
